A control consisting of 20 mg of linoleic acid, 200 mg of Tween 40 and 50 mL of hydrogen peroxide was used to calibrate the spectrophotometer. A negative control tube was prepared by replacing the EO with ethanol. The absorbance was finally measured at 470 nm against a blank (emulsion without β-carotene).
